valid_samples.generated: <beg> preheat oven to 350 degrees . <step> in a large bowl , combine the flour , baking powder , salt , and pepper . <step>
valid_samples.gold: in a bowl , dissolve the yeast with lukewarm and sugar for about 5 minutes , then add flour , salt and oil . <step> knead the dough until is smooth and elastic . add more flour if it is too sticky . cover it and leave it in warm place until doubled in size , about one hour . <step> dice the onion and red paprika . mix the butter with garlic . <step> after dough has risen , turn dough onto a lightly floured surface . add in the diced onion and red paprika and knead until combine well . divide in 2 pieces . form dough into balls and let them rest for about 15 minutes . <step> roll out the dough until very thin . spread the butter and garlic mixture over dough . top with a light sprinkling of salt , pepper and chives . <step> heat the stove - top grill pan over high heat . flip the dough over , transfer in the pan and cook for about 3 - 4 minutes or until it gets grill marks on the bottom . <step> spread the butter and garlic mixture and top with salt , pepper and chives . then carefully flip the dough in the pan and cook for an additional 3 - 4 minutes . <step> once ready , top with rocket , then using a pizza cutter cut into strips . <end> <mask> <mask> <mask> <mask> <mask> <mask> <mask> <mask> <mask> <mask> <mask> <mask> <mask> <mask> <mask> <mask> <mask> <mask> <mask> <mask> <mask> <mask> <mask> <mask> <mask> <mask> <mask> <mask> <mask> <mask> <mask> <mask> <mask> <mask> <mask> <mask> <mask> <mask> <mask> <mask> <mask> <mask> <mask> <mask> <mask> <mask> <mask> <mask> <mask> <mask> <mask> <mask> <mask> <mask> <mask> <mask> <mask> <mask> <mask>

best_bleu_matches_train.best_match: pre - heat the oven to 350 degrees . <step> lightly grease a donut pan . <step> in a large bowl , combine the whole wheat flour , all - purpose flour , baking powder , cinnamon , and salt . <step> in a small bowl , combine the mashed bananas , non - dairy milk , sugar , melted coconut oil , and vanilla . <step> add the wet ingredients to the dry ingredients and mix until they 're just combined . be careful not to over - mix . <step> spoon or pipe the batter into the greased donut pan . <step> bake the donuts for 10 - 12 minutes , until they are golden brown and firm to the touch . <step> remove the donuts from the oven and allow them to cool . <step> while the donuts are cooling , prepare the frosting by heating the peanut butter and non - dairy milk in a small bowl in the microwave for about 15 - 20 seconds . this will help everything to blend together . <step> stir the peanut butter and non - dairy milk to combine , then mix in the vanilla . <step> sift in the powdered sugar and whisk until no lumps remain . <step> once the donuts have cooled , dip each donut into the peanut butter frosting and set aside on a lined baking sheet or cooling rack to allow the frosting to solidify . <step> the donuts can be stored at room temperature for a couple of days , or in the fridge for up to a week . <end> <mask> <mask> <mask> <mask> <mask> <mask> <mask> <mask> <mask> <mask> <mask> <mask> <mask> <mask> <mask> <mask> <mask> <mask> <mask> <mask> <mask> <mask> <mask> <mask> <mask> <mask> <mask> <mask> <mask> <mask>
